thread.title: Huge Collection of Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Promo Art
thread.title_full: Huge Collection of Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Promo Art

author: Jay Jayson
title: Huge Collection of Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Promo Art
text:
Huge Collection of Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Promo Art Jay Jayson Start Slideshow Slide of 
The VK Marvel Studios Movies fansite has compiled a massive collection of Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 promotional artwork, featuring new and sensational looks at Star-Lord, Gamora, Rocket, Drax, Baby Groot, Nebula, Mantis, Yondu, and Ego's human form. 
Click on our " Start Slideshow " feature to view a whopping 45 images that will be used to sell Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 merchandise, such as t-shirts, posters, and stickers. 
Set to the backdrop of ‘Awesome Mixtape #2,’ Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team’s adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill’s true parentage. Old foes become new allies and fan-favorite characters from the classic comics will come to our heroes’ aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand. 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 is written and directed by James Gunn (Slither). The film marks the return of the original Guardians, including Chris Pratt (Jurassic World) as Peter Quill/Star-Lord; Zoe Saldana (Star Trek Into Darkness) as Gamora; Dave Bautista ( Spectre ) as Drax; Vin Diesel ( Furious 7 ) as the voice of Groot; Bradley Cooper ( American Sniper ) as the voice of Rocket; Michael Rooker ( Jumper ) as Yondu; Karen Gillan ( The Big Short ) as Nebula; and Sean Gunn ( Gilmore Girls ) as Kraglin. New cast members include Pom Klementieff ( Oldboy ), Elizabeth Debicki ( The Great Gatsby, Everest ), Chris Sullivan ( The Knick, The Drop ) and Kurt Russell ( The Hateful Eight, The Thing ). Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 is scheduled to hit theaters on May 5, 2017 . Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 2017
